desc: “This book is a key source for identifying measures for closing the communication gap through new approaches for face-to-face communication, opportunities to create social bonding and social capital, and taking advantage of the full communication cycle. Featuring extensive coverage across a range of relevant perspectives and topics, such as expectation, value and return (EVR), high-teach, and two-way interaction”–
title: Solutions for High-Touch Communications in a High-Tech World (Advances in Human and Social Aspects of Technology)
